name: Chess Cubed
description: Don't give up - Turn things around! Chess Cubed offers the first, true 3D Chess Experience! Play others in a new uncharted world of chess where the books on strategies of old mean nothing. Defeat challengers from all directions and raise your flag in this new world!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Pentium 4 / AMD Athlon 64 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 8800GS / ATI Radeon HD 3870 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
